grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 驚異【キョウイ】wonder, miracle, amazement, prodigy
驚愕【キョウガク】astonishment, amazement, surprise, fright, shock
kun reading compounds: 驚く【おどろく】to be surprised, to be astonished
驚くほど【おどろくほど】to a surprising degree, to a remarkable extent, surprisingly, astonishingly, amazingly, alarmingly
驚かす【おどろかす】to surprise, to frighten, to create a stir
